fields.name: Organisation code
fields.description: A unique code to identify an organisation, preferably a Linked Data URI. Local authorities can search for theirs here: http://uris.opendata.esd.org.uk and is likely to be from http://opendatacommunities.org or ONS http://tinyurl.com/onsgeog

fields.name: Effective date
fields.description: Date at which theï¿¼information provided is true. The UK date format (dd/mm/yyyy) should be used.

fields.name: Highest salary
fields.description: Includes all taxable earnings for the given year, including base salary, variable pay, bonuses, allowances and the cash value of any benefits-in-kind, but exclude changes in pension benefits, which due to their variety and complexity cannot be accurately included in a pay multiple disclosure.

fields.name: Median salary
fields.description: Median salary of all employees of the organisation.

fields.name: Mean salary
fields.description: Median salary of all employees of the organisation.

fields.name: Ratio
fields.description: Ratio of: Highest salary to Median salary. Show as decimal e.g. 6.3, (not a ratio 6:1)

fields.name: Period
fields.description: Specify the financial year for which the pay multiple is calculated. For example 2014/15. Needed for submissions to www.paycompare.org.uk.

fields.name: Model calculation
fields.description: Use code from 0 to 4 to specify what factor was used to calculate the ratio. Needed for submissions to www.paycompare.org.uk. Codes: 0 Unreported or otherwise uncertain; 1 Highest : median of whole workforce; 2 Highest : median of non-chief officers; 3 Highest : mean of whole workforce; 4 Highest : lowest

fields.name: Organisation type
fields.description: Use abbreviation to specify type of public organisation. To meet the requirement of www.paycompare.org.uk: BC Borough council; CC County council; DC District council; LBC London borough council; LLP Limited liability partnership; MBC Metropolitan borough council; PC Parish council; PLC Public limited company; PUB Public body; TC Town council; UNA Unitary authority
